data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shy, Jhy-Yun, Wowor, Daisy, Ng, Peter K. L. (2013): A new record of the giant freshwater prawn, Macrobrachium spinipes (Schenkel, 1902) (Crustacea: Decapoda: Palaemonidae) from Taiwan, with notes on its taxonomy. Zootaxa 3734 (1): 45-55, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3734.1.5
